appearances.title: Mornings With Maria Bartiromo : FBC : January 14, 2026 6:00am-7:00am EST
appearances.snippet: montana congressman troy downing and at 630 heritage foundation vp of national security victoria coates us. all that ahead with the hot topic of the hour, president trump touring a ford plant in detroit, michigan touting his administration's economic winds less than one full year back in office. >> after less than 12 months in office i'm back in michigan to report on the strongest and fastest economic turnaround in our country's history. we have $18 trillion being invested the most of any country ever was three. >> under our administration growth is exploding productivity is soaring, investment is booming and comes arising. inflation is defeated. america is respected again like never before. one year ago we were a dead country now are the hottest country anywhere in the world. >> we quickly gone from the worst numbers on record to the best and strongest numbers are most dynamic numbers and an economy that is far ahead of even my optimistic inflation way way down we inherited terrible growth in the worst inflation in the history of our country. the fourth-quarter is projected at 5.4% tha
